content.icerik: Suitable for all skin types and age-groups, this rich hydrating and energizing cream-mask is a de-stressing beauty booster, especially for dehydrated, tired and dull skin. Binding tremendous amounts of moisture to skin and reloading skin with new energy, it is a unique product for a luminous, natural, healthy looking skin. Skin brightness improves, skin becomes more elastic, tone and radiant. Apply to cleansed face and neck 1-2 times a week. After 10 minutes wipe away residue with a cotton pad.
